quests.name: A New Recruit
objectives:
Clean up the camp.
  ‧ Break the 8 Rocks.
  ‧ Dig out the 12 Rice Spills.

Look around the Realm to find pieces of your Training Uniform and bring them to Mushu:
  ‧ Training Pants.
  ‧ Training Shirt.
  ‧ Training Shoes.
  ‧ Training Socks.
Bring the Training Uniform items to Mushu.
Prepare a bowl of Mushu's Congee for Mulan.
Ring the gong next to Mulan's tent to wake her up.
Make sure you have Mushu's Congee in your Inventory.

spoilers.title: Training Pants
spoilers.objective: In a tree, just to the left of the bridge to the camp after entering the realm.

spoilers.title: Training Shirt
spoilers.objective: Inside a medium sized tent, a few steps in and to the right after entering the camp.

spoilers.title: Training Shoes
spoilers.objective: On a rock, beside the path outside the camp, just beside the river.

spoilers.title: Training Socks
spoilers.objective: Inside a small tent to the left after entering the camp.

quests.name: The Dragon Army
objectives:
Search for materials for Mushu's Dragon Statues:
  ‧ 50 Camp Mud.
  ‧ 3 Buckets of Water.
  ‧ 10 Firewood.
  ‧ 10 Red Spider Lilies.
  ‧ 5 Chrysanthemums.
  ‧ 10 Dream Shards from Dreamlight Valley.
  ‧ Take a picture of Mushu.
Interact with the kiln to place the Unfired Dragon Statue and the Firewood.
Wait for the four batches of Dragon Statues to be fired.

quests.name: Clearing the Road
objectives:
The ground was shaking! What just happened?!
  ‧ Follow Mushu and Mulan outside of camp.
Listen to Mushu and Mulan discuss the landslide.
Check in with Mulan to clear the road to camp.
Gather 25 more Wooden Logs to craft a fence.
Place the 4 Wooden Fence at the base of the mountain.
Follow Mushu to the bridge to send the signal.
Watch as Mushu sends the signal.
Progress with Mulan while Mushu waits for the delivery wagon.
Search for Mulan's Key in the Realm.
Use Mulan's Key to unlock her chest.
Go to Dreamlight Valley with Mushu.
